## opossum-prometheus package

A library that adds metrics to the `opossum` circuit breaker

## Classes

| Class                                                                  | Description             |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------- |
| [CircuitBreakerMetrics](./opossum-prometheus.circuitbreakermetrics.md) | Circuit breaker metrics |

## Interfaces

| Interface                                                                                                                      | Description                                             |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------- |
| [CircuitBreakerMetricsOptions](./opossum-prometheus.circuitbreakermetricsoptions.md)                                           | Circuit breaker metrics options                         |
| [CircuitBreakerMetricsOptionsOverrides](./opossum-prometheus.circuitbreakermetricsoptionsoverrides.md)                         | Circuit breaker metrics options overrides               |
| [CircuitBreakerMetricsOptionsOverridesMetric](./opossum-prometheus.circuitbreakermetricsoptionsoverridesmetric.md)             | Circuit breaker metrics options overrides metric        |
| [CircuitBreakerMetricsOptionsOverridesMetricLabels](./opossum-prometheus.circuitbreakermetricsoptionsoverridesmetriclabels.md) | Circuit breaker metrics options overrides metric labels |
